title: Remove Account
init:
OF.setActiveFootermenu();OF.setFootermenu();$('body').addClass('textured');$('#subheader').text(_(OF.page.title));var userTmpl=tmpl('user_tmpl');var html='';html+=userTmpl(OF.user);$("#remove_account").hide().html(html).fadeIn();if(OF.user.has_set_password==false){$("#set_password").touch(function(){OF.navigateToUrl('settings/init_account');});$("#set_password_tip").unhide();}
$('#submit').touch(function(){var button=$(this);if(!button.isLoading()){button.isLoading(true);OF.api.request('/xp/devices/'+OF.device.identifier+"/users/"+OF.user.id,{method:'DELETE',loader:'#submit',success:function(){alert(_('Your account has been successfully removed from this device.'));OF.sendAction('logout');},complete:function(){button.isLoading(false);}});}});
